thread.title_full: Brosix Releases New Version of Its Personal and Enterprise Instant Messaging App

author: Chris Bibey
title: Brosix Releases New Version of Its Personal and Enterprise Instant Messaging App
text:
Brosix today announced the release of the newest version of its personal and enterprise instant messaging app. With Brosix Version 3.7.5, clients can now have access to additional features that improve communication between colleagues, efficiency through an easy-to-navigate interface, and productivity within the workplace and at home. The app’s most notable change, the “Broadcast Message” feature, allows users to send messages to groups within their contact list simultaneously. Recipients quickly receive the group message, granting fast and easy updates on projects and collaborations among employers and co-workers. The conversations are then archived in the local chat history as well as the history on the server for future access.
Other notable additions include:
 Updated themes. Updated splash image and setup icon. Passive mode for plug-ins.
“We take great pride in listening to client feedback. This is why we added a variety of new features to version 3.7.5, including Broadcast Message,” said Brosix CEO Stefan Chekanov. “With this new feature, it will be easier for anybody to share a message with a large number of recipients. It is yet another way for users to improve the way they communicate at their place of employment.”
Using Brosix Version 3.7.5, clients can now enjoy the ease and functionality of new features, bringing communications within the workplace one step further.
Download the newest version of Brosix at Brosix Personal or Brosix Enterprise.
About Brosix:
Brosix was founded in 2006 to develop easy-to-use, secure communication tools for home and enterprises. The company strives to enable people and companies to benefit from innovative instant messaging and other Internet communication technologies without making substantial investments in hardware, software, infrastructure, or day-to-day maintenance. During the last few years, Brosix has created several applications in the field of Instant Messaging and Peer-to-Peer communication allowing customers the ease and capability to stay connected from work or home. To learn more about Brosix, please visit their website at http://www.brosix.com .
